alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 1:17AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Henderson County through 145 AM CDT... At 117 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Caney City, or 8 miles south of Gun Barrel City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Athens, Gun Barrel City, Malakoff, Eustace, Trinidad, Enchanted Oaks, Caney City, Trinidad Lake, Forest Grove Reservoir, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Cross Roads, Payne Springs, Log Cabin, Murchison, Star Harbor, Crescent Heights, and Mankin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
